nodes.text: A study published this month in the journal Pediatrics claimed children do better when their same-sex parents are allowed to marry or enter a civil union. According to marriage and family experts, such reporting fails to recognize myriad reports that show kids do better in a home with a biological mother and father.
I don't know how this can be true. Thank God that I didn't grow up with my biological father. I'm not really interested in being a jerk.:xbanghead
